Paper.Title: Spoken Language Processing in the Framework of Human-Machine Communication at LIMSI

Section.S: The paper provides an overview of the research conducted at LIMSI in the field of speech processing, but also in the related areas of Human-Machine Communication, including Natural Language Processing, Non Verbal and Multimodal Communication.
Also presented are the commercial applications of some of the research projects.
When applicable, the discussion is placed in the framework of international collaborations.
